page.title: 09GARDEN CENTRES IN THE AREA.
page.content:
There are two garden centres in the area. One in Temple Normanton owned Mr Handbury is really a nursery. It deals mainly with the 'trade' supplying garden centres, shops and the local councils with plants.
The other, in Winsick, is owned by the Van Gemeren brothers and has been open to the public since 1952. It covers an area of ten acres and includes shops, greenhouses and an outdoor area where sectional buildings are on display.
In addition to the two brothers who still work as gardeners, two full time and four part time workers are employed. Roses and bulbs are a speciality of the centre but a variety of other plants are available.
